item.title: Online Courses
item.description: Table of Contents Online Courses edx online courses R Programming courses: Data Science related courses: Mechine Learning courses: Coursera online courses R Programming courses: Data Science related courses: Mechine Learning courses: Preview Image Citation Online Courses There are many great online learning platforms that provide various elementary and advanced courses of R/Data science/R-packages. Most of those courses is free, but you can also choose some charged courses for specific needs or pay for a verified certificate of the courses.
